column2: "Mbransɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara hom ndwen do nyɛ
column3: na hom aatsena ase
column5: na wɔaakɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no."

column2: "Na hom nkaa ɔkwan nyinara a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn egya wo wɔ mu mfe eduanan yi wɔ sar no do no
column3: dɛ ɔrebrɛ hom adze
column5: ehu dza ɔwɔ hom akoma mu
column6: dɛ hom bedzi ne mbransɛm do

column2: "Na ɔbrɛɛ hom adze
column3: na ɔmaa ɔkɔm dzee hom
column4: na ɔdze manna a hom nnyim
column5: na hom egyanom so nnyim maa hom dzii; na ɔaama hom ehu dɛ nnyɛ edziban nko bi na nyimpa nam do tsena ase
column6: na asɛm biara a ofi EWURADZE anomu so nyimpa nam do tsena ase."

column2: "Hom nkataho ennsuw wɔ hom ho
column3: nkyii so w'anan annhohon mfe eduanan yi mu."

column2: "Na dwen wɔ w'akoma mu dɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa tsea ne ba no
column4: dɛmara so na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn tsea wo."

column2: "Na hom ndzi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne mbransɛm do
column3: dɛ hom bɛnantsew n'akwan do

column2: "Na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom rokɔ asaase pa do
column3: asaase a no do wɔ nworansu
column4: nsunyiwa nye ebun a ofifi abɔn nye akoko mu pem no;"

column2: "asaase a ewifua nye atoko
column3: nye wenyinndua nye adɔmbandua nye  pɔmegranate  ekutu wɔ do; asaase a  olive  na ewo wɔ do no;"

column2: "asaase a irinndzi edziban a wɔ do
column3: adze biara so rinnhia wo wɔ do; asaase a n'abo yɛ dadze
column4: na n'akokoe mu na hom botu boran."

column2: "Na sɛ hom bedzidzi mee a
column3: hom na nhyira EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn wɔ asaase pa a ɔdze ama hom no ntsi."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie ɔno bɛyɛ na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dɛ hom rinndzi ne mbransɛm
column3: nye ne ntsɛmbu nye n'ahyɛdze a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do:"

column2: "bɛyɛ so na hom edzidzi amee
column3: na hom esisi adan fɛɛfɛw

column2: "na sɛ hom anantwikuw nye hom nguankuw adɔr
column3: na hom dwetɛ nye hom sika adɔɔ so
column4: na adze a hom wɔ nyinara adɔɔ so a;"

column2: "nkyɛ hom akoma amema no ho do
column3: na hom werɛ efir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn a oyii hom fii Egypt asaase do

column2: "nyia ogyaa hom faa sar kɛse huhuhuhu no do
column3: mbrɛ mbowatsena a bɔr wɔ hɔn ano nye nyankoma nketsebowa wɔ
column4: nye asaase kwawee mbrɛ nsu nnyi; nyia oyi nsu fii ɔtwerɛbo botan mu maa hom;"

column2: "nyia ɔdze  manna   a hom egyanom nnyim nyɛɛn hom wɔ sar no do; dɛ ɔdze rebrɛ hom adze
column3: na ɔasɔ hom ahwɛ
column4: na ɔayɛ hom yie wɔ hom ewiei ekyir no mu:"

column2: "na sɛ wɔ hom akoma mu dɛ
column3: Hɛn tum nye hɔn nsa ne dzen na wɔama yenya ahonya yi."

column2: "Na hom nkaa EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column3: na ɔno na ɔmaa hom tum dɛ hom mfa nya homho; na ɔaama n'ahyɛmu a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom no etsim
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ hom werɛ fir EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column4: na hom kedzi enyame fofor ekyir
column7: midzi hom dase ndɛ da yi

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE sɛɛ amanaman fi hom enyim no
column3: dɛmara na hom bɛsɛɛ; osiandɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ndze no."
